titles.title: NPR Act
No Partisan Radio Act
NPR Act
To eliminate taxpayer funding for the partisan radio outlet known as National Public Radio, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications and Technology.

bill.summary:
No Partisan Radio Act or the NPR Act
This bill prohibits federal funding of National Public Radio (NPR), including by prohibiting the use of federal funds received by a public broadcast station to pay dues to or purchase programming from NPR.
